attributes.action: outlaw any gov't contact with Hamas until charter is changed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There have been reports of UK officials meeting Hamas affiliated politicians. 

The ideology of Hamas rules out prospects for a peaceful 2-state solution (Article 13 of their charter: Initiatives and so-called peaceful solutions … are in contradiction to the principles of the Islamic Resistance Movement [Hamas]), thus any gov't contact should be outlaw until they change their charter.

The charter is rife with hatred, accusing the ‘enemy’ of being behind World War I, WW II, the French and Communist Revolutions, forming secret societies, such as the Freemasons, Rotary Clubs and others, controlling world media, news agencies, the press, publishing houses, broadcasting stations, referring to the anti-Semitic ‘Protocols of the Elders of Zion’. 

charter is rife with Islamic extremism:  Article 8 (slogan): …Jihad is its path and death for the sake of Allah is the loftiest of its wishes. 

We want no lawful govt contact until they change their stance!
